title: String truncate assertion failed with some chars

labels.name: C-enhancement

body:
This assertion failed when using a specific charset : `liballoc/string.rs:1557`

Step to reproduce : 
```rust
fn main() {
    let mut s = "ボルテックス".to_string();
    s.truncate(4);
}
```
